title: Bhavana case main accused Pulsar Suni in police custody after surrender - Tamil Movie News
text: Bhavana bereaved Pulsar Suni the mastermind behind the horrifying molestation of actress Bhavana was taken into custody when he surrendered before the Magistratesâ€™ Court in Kochi. Police are also questioning the flat caretaker of a popular actor-director who was also involved and basing on his revelations may pull in the celebrity too. Meanwhile the entire film fraternity of India are behind Bhavana and condemning the hideous act and are pressing for the most severe punishment to the culprits.
